statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, survey_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, survey_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE survey_id = 10
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 3 ORDER BY feedback_id
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY survey_id
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%'
SELECT * FROM SurveyFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM SurveyFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT promotion_description, discount_amount FROM PersonalizedPromotions WHERE discount_amount >= 25.00;
SELECT survey_id, feedback_text FROM SurveyFeedback ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT promotion_id, customer_id FROM PersonalizedPromotions ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY survey_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM SurveyFeedback LEFT JOIN PersonalizedPromotions ON SurveyFeedback.customer_id = PersonalizedPromotions.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, promotion_description FROM PersonalizedPromotions WHERE discount_amount >= 50.00 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_description, discount_amount FROM PersonalizedPromotions WHERE promotion_id BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM SurveyFeedback WHERE rating = 5 AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM PersonalizedPromotions) ORDER BY survey_id DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_feedback;
SELECT survey_id, feedback_text, submission_date FROM survey_feedback WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, preferred_promotion_id, notification_preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE notification_preference = TRUE;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, submission_date, feedback_text FROM survey_feedback ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount > 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, promotion_name FROM customer_preferences JOIN promotions ON customer_preferences.preferred_promotion_id = promotions.promotion_id;
SELECT feedback_text, submission_date FROM survey_feedback ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, notification_preference FROM customer_preferences WHERE notification_preference = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM Promotion WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, AVG(promotion_discount) AS avg_discount FROM CustomerPromotion GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_discount > 0.1;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date, JSON_LENGTH(survey_responses) AS responses_count FROM CustomerSurvey WHERE JSON_LENGTH(survey_responses) > 5 ORDER BY responses_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, survey_date FROM CustomerSurvey ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM Promotion WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, promotion_id, promotion_discount FROM CustomerPromotion WHERE promotion_discount >= 0.1;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM Promotions ORDER BY promotion_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount >= 100.00 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM Promotions WHERE discount >= 0.10 ORDER BY promotion_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
